titleStmt.title: A new song, called, Parthenia's complaint on the ingratitude of Strephon. to a delicate new tune. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "As on the dearest Strephon's breast Parthenia lean'd her mournfull head ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
